title: Introducing: Krusoe
body:
There’s a unassuming funkiness that underpins S.

O.S, the debut track from **Krusoe** – an almost swagger that develops as the track builds. Merging classical influences with more contemporary, electronic inspirations, there’s enough of a pop edge for it to be addictive and accessible, whilst also feeling like Krusoe is carving out a sound uniquely his own. _S.O.S._ is the first of hopefully much more to come. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.

Merging classical influences with more contemporary, electronic inspirations, there’s enough of a pop edge for it to be addictive and accessible, whilst also feeling like Krusoe is carving out a sound uniquely his own. \[…\]
